meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, City Council Briefing Room, 6ES

agenda_items.title: Call To Order & Roll Call
agenda_items.description: Chairman John Mark Davidson calls the meeting to order and conducts roll call.

agenda_items.title: Purpose of the CPOB
agenda_items.description: Chairman John Mark Davidson discusses the purpose of the Community Police Oversight Board.

agenda_items.title: Update: City of Dallas Recruitment Strategy and Process for the Chief of Police
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the recruitment strategy for the next Dallas Police Chief.

agenda_items.title: New Complaint Intake Specialist Yolanda Cole
agenda_items.description: Introduction of Yolanda Cole as the new Complaint Intake Specialist.

agenda_items.title: City Council Appointment of Ozzie Smith as CPOB Vice Chair
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the appointment of Ozzie Smith.

agenda_items.title: City Council District 11 Re-appointment of Arlene Steinfeld
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the re-appointment of Arlene Steinfeld.

agenda_items.title: Approval of February 11, 2025, CPOB Regular Meeting Minutes
agenda_items.description: Review and approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: Director Report
agenda_items.description: Report from the Director on various operational updates.

agenda_items.title: Special Investigator Report
agenda_items.description: Report on critical incidents and independent investigations.

agenda_items.title: Policy Analyst Report
agenda_items.description: Updates on legislative briefings and policy enhancements.

agenda_items.title: Community Engagement
agenda_items.description: Discussion on community outreach and engagement plans.

agenda_items.title: Internal Affairs Division (IAD) Report
agenda_items.description: Report from the Internal Affairs Division.

agenda_items.title: Monthly Activity Reports
agenda_items.description: Review of monthly activity reports.

agenda_items.title: Community Police Oversight Board Reports / Briefings
agenda_items.description: Updates from board members.

agenda_items.title: Chairman Report
agenda_items.description: Report from the Chairman.

agenda_items.title: CPOB Standing Subcommittees Reports
agenda_items.description: Reports from various subcommittees.

agenda_items.title: Upcoming CPOB Meetings
agenda_items.description: Discussion on future meeting dates.

agenda_items.title: Public Comment/Open Microphone
agenda_items.description: Opportunity for public comments.

agenda_items.title: Board Members Comments
agenda_items.description: Comments from board members.

agenda_items.title: Adjournment
agenda_items.description: Formal adjournment of the meeting.
